name: The North Face Paramount Active Convertible Pants - Men's
description: Built for active hikers, these lightweight pants stretch, breathe and shed light precip. The gusseted crotch and articulated knees give you freedom to bound over logs or high-step up rocky trails. A convertible design provides coverage for warm or cool weather.Lightweight, breathable polyester with lots of spandex for stretch.FlashDry-XD™ technology wicks sweat and a Durable Water Repellency finish shrugs off light rain.Elastic waistband with internal drawcord.Zip-off legs convert to shorts with a 9in. inseam.Slim fit.
